name: Pocket Monkey
description:
Help the baby monkey reach his midday snack!  This monkey still can't move on his own without your help and guidance, so r e w i n d him on the right path or he'll be sad :P

Made for the Fourth Brackeys Game Jam (Theme: Rewind)

*If the game is lagging, check to see if your browser's hardware acceleration is turned on. Otherwise, try downloading the game (Windows only)

**WebGL version has issues with jumping SFX, if this is an issue, try lowering the SFX volume or downloading the game.

Controls

Right click the monkey in green "holdable" regions to move and charge him.

Clicking the restart UI button or pressing the 'R' key restarts the level.

Credits

Graphic design: @bananamoon99 on insta

Programmer: @Intradom on Itch.io

Source Code

Available at https://github.com/Intradom/Pocket_Monkey

External Assets

Soundtrack: 8 bit paradise (Youtube, royalty free)

SFX Winding: https://freesound.org/people/lmbubec/sounds/118816/

SFX Release: https://freesound.org/people/monotraum/sounds/376195/
